verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Go<WH935> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, and say<WH559> unto him, Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>, Let my people<WH5971> go<WH7971>, that they may serve<WH5647> me.
And if thou refuse<WH3986> to let them go<WH7971>, behold, I will smite<WH5062> all thy borders<WH1366> with frogs<WH6854>:

And the river<WH2975> shall bring forth<WH8317> frogs<WH6854> abundantly<WH8317>, which shall go up<WH5927> and come<WH935> into thine house<WH1004>, and into thy bedchamber<WH2315> <WH4904>, and upon thy bed<WH4296>, and into the house<WH1004> of thy servants<WH5650>, and upon thy people<WH5971>, and into thine ovens<WH8574>, and into thy kneadingtroughs<WH4863>: kneadingtroughs: or, dough
And the frogs<WH6854> shall come up<WH5927> both on thee, and upon thy people<WH5971>, and upon all thy servants<WH5650>.

And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Say<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Stretch forth<WH5186> thine hand<WH3027> with thy rod<WH4294> over the streams<WH5104>, over the rivers<WH2975>, and over the ponds<WH98>, and cause frogs<WH6854> to come up<WH5927> upon the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
And Aaron<WH175> stretched out<WH5186> his hand<WH3027> over the waters<WH4325> of Egypt<WH4714>; and the frogs<WH6854> came up<WH5927>, and covered<WH3680> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
And the magicians<WH2748> did<WH6213> so with their enchantments<WH3909>, and brought up<WH5927> frogs<WH6854> upon the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.

Then Pharaoh<WH6547> called<WH7121> for Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175>, and said<WH559>, Intreat<WH6279> the LORD<WH3068>, that he may take away<WH5493> the frogs<WH6854> from me, and from my people<WH5971>; and I will let the people<WH5971> go<WH7971>, that they may do sacrifice<WH2076> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, Glory<WH6286> over me: when<WH4970> shall I intreat<WH6279> for thee, and for thy servants<WH5650>, and for thy people<WH5971>, to destroy<WH3772> the frogs<WH6854> from thee and thy houses<WH1004>, that they may remain<WH7604> in the river<WH2975> only? Glory: or, Have this honour over me, etc when: or, against when to destroy: Heb. to cut off

And he said<WH559>, To morrow<WH4279>. And he said<WH559>, Be it according to thy word<WH1697>: that thou mayest know<WH3045> that there is none like unto the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430>. To morrow: or, Against to morrow
And the frogs<WH6854> shall depart<WH5493> from thee, and from thy houses<WH1004>, and from thy servants<WH5650>, and from thy people<WH5971>; they shall remain<WH7604> in the river<WH2975> only.

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> went out<WH3318> from Pharaoh<WH6547>: and Moses<WH4872> cried<WH6817> unto the LORD<WH3068> because of<WH1697> the frogs<WH6854> which he had brought<WH7760> against Pharaoh<WH6547>.

And the LORD<WH3068> did<WH6213> according to the word<WH1697> of Moses<WH4872>; and the frogs<WH6854> died<WH4191> out of the houses<WH1004>, out of the villages<WH2691>, and out of the fields<WH7704>.
And they gathered them together<WH6651> upon heaps<WH2563>: and the land<WH776> stank<WH887>.
But when Pharaoh<WH6547> saw<WH7200> that there was respite<WH7309>, he hardened<WH3513> his heart<WH3820>, and hearkened<WH8085> not unto them; as the LORD<WH3068> had said<WH1696>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Say<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Stretch out<WH5186> thy rod<WH4294>, and smite<WH5221> the dust<WH6083> of the land<WH776>, that it may become lice<WH3654> throughout all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.

And they did<WH6213> so; for Aaron<WH175> stretched out<WH5186> his hand<WH3027> with his rod<WH4294>, and smote<WH5221> the dust<WH6083> of the earth<WH776>, and it became lice<WH3654> in man<WH120>, and in beast<WH929>; all the dust<WH6083> of the land<WH776> became lice<WH3654> throughout all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.

And the magicians<WH2748> did<WH6213> so with their enchantments<WH3909> to bring forth<WH3318> lice<WH3654>, but they could<WH3201> not: so there were lice<WH3654> upon man<WH120>, and upon beast<WH929>.

Then the magicians<WH2748> said<WH559> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, This is the finger<WH676> of God<WH430>: and Pharaoh's<WH6547> heart<WH3820> was hardened<WH2388>, and he hearkened<WH8085> not unto them; as the LORD<WH3068> had said<WH1696>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Rise up early<WH7925> in the morning<WH1242>, and stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> Pharaoh<WH6547>; lo, he cometh forth<WH3318> to the water<WH4325>; and say<WH559> unto him, Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>, Let my people<WH5971> go<WH7971>, that they may serve<WH5647> me.

Else, if thou wilt not let my people<WH5971> go<WH7971>, behold, I will send<WH7971> swarms<WH6157> of flies upon thee, and upon thy servants<WH5650>, and upon thy people<WH5971>, and into thy houses<WH1004>: and the houses<WH1004> of the Egyptians<WH4714> shall be full<WH4390> of swarms<WH6157> of flies, and also the ground<WH127> whereon they are. swarms: or, a mixture of noisome beasts, etc

And I will sever<WH6395> in that day<WH3117> the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>, in which my people<WH5971> dwell<WH5975>, that no<WH1115> swarms<WH6157> of flies shall be<WH1961> there; to the end<WH4616> thou mayest know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> in the midst<WH7130> of the earth<WH776>.
And I will put<WH7760> a division<WH6304> between my people<WH5971> and thy people<WH5971>: to morrow<WH4279> shall this sign<WH226> be. a division: Heb. a redemption to morrow: or, by to morrow

And the LORD<WH3068> did<WH6213> so; and there came<WH935> a grievous<WH3515> swarm<WH6157> of flies into the house<WH1004> of Pharaoh<WH6547>, and into his servants'<WH5650> houses<WH1004>, and into all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>: the land<WH776> was corrupted<WH7843> by reason<WH6440> of the swarm<WH6157> of flies. corrupted: or, destroyed
And Pharaoh<WH6547> called<WH7121> for<WH413> Moses<WH4872> and for Aaron<WH175>, and said<WH559>, Go<WH3212> ye, sacrifice<WH2076> to your God<WH430> in the land<WH776>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559>, It is not meet<WH3559> so to do<WH6213>; for<WH2005> we shall sacrifice<WH2076> the abomination<WH8441> of the Egyptians<WH4714> to the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430>: lo, shall we sacrifice<WH2076> the abomination<WH8441> of the Egyptians<WH4714> before their eyes<WH5869>, and will they not stone<WH5619> us?
We will go<WH3212> three<WH7969> days'<WH3117> journey<WH1870> into the wilderness<WH4057>, and sacrifice<WH2076> to the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430>, as he shall command<WH559> us.

And Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559>, I will let you go<WH7971>, that ye may sacrifice<WH2076> to the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> in the wilderness<WH4057>; only ye shall not go<WH3212> very<WH7368> far away<WH7368>: intreat<WH6279> for me<WH1157>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559>, Behold, I go out<WH3318> from thee, and I will intreat<WH6279> the LORD<WH3068> that the swarms<WH6157> of flies may depart<WH5493> from Pharaoh<WH6547>, from his servants<WH5650>, and from his people<WH5971>, to morrow<WH4279>: but<WH7535> let not Pharaoh<WH6547> deal deceitfully<WH2048> any more<WH3254> in not<WH1115> letting the people<WH5971> go<WH7971> to sacrifice<WH2076> to the LORD<WH3068>.
And Moses<WH4872> went out<WH3318> from Pharaoh<WH6547>, and intreated<WH6279> the LORD<WH3068>.

And the LORD<WH3068> did<WH6213> according to the word<WH1697> of Moses<WH4872>; and he removed<WH5493> the swarms<WH6157> of flies from Pharaoh<WH6547>, from his servants<WH5650>, and from his people<WH5971>; there remained<WH7604> not one<WH259>.
And Pharaoh<WH6547> hardened<WH3513> his heart<WH3820> at this time<WH6471> also, neither would he let the people<WH5971> go<WH7971>.
